title: Double Penetration
description: In this erotic threesome story Nate is invited to join married couple, Max and Carla, for a night of sexual fun and pleasure. Carla has a fetish for being serviced by two men at the same time and really enjoys double penetration. It's Nate's first time doing anything like this and finds himself hooked on the idea by the time the night is over. Adults only 18+
